posts1.name: Shweta Kale
posts1.description:
Exercise is physical activity that we have to perform on a repetitive basis for relaxing our body and
taking away all the mental stress. It is important to do regular exercise. When you do this on a daily
basis, you become fit both physically and mentally. Moreover, not exercising daily can make a person
susceptible to different diseases. Thus, just like eating food daily, we must also exercise daily.

posts2.name: Shweta Kale
posts2.description:
In order to conserve nature, we must take drastic steps right away to prevent any further damage.
The most important step is to prevent deforestation at all levels.
